name: plus

effect.x_y: Powers up only when paired with minus.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Powers up only when paired with minus.

short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.x_y: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
